languages.text: "Творцы плоти, что предпочитают скрываться в своих лабораториях и творить кошмары из тех материалов, что поставляют им их слуги. Орудия боли, гротески, развалины — все это плоды их тонкого ремесла".

traits.locale_text: "Ты сам{mf||а} сталкивал{mf|ся|ась} с одним из их рода. Гемункулы — творцы плоти, что предпочитают скрываться в своих лабораториях и творить кошмары из тех материалов, что поставляют им их покровители. Орудия боли, гротески, развалины — все это плоды их нечистых трудов, верно служащие кабалам".

languages.text: "Artists of the flesh who prefer to hide away in their laboratories and create nightmares from the materials their servants supply. Engines of Pain, Grotesques, Wracks — all are the fruits of their subtle craft."
languages.original_text: "Творцы плоти, что предпочитают скрываться в своих лабораториях и творить кошмары из тех материалов, что поставляют им их слуги. Орудия боли, гротески, развалины — все это плоды их тонкого ремесла".

traits.locale_text: "Artists of the flesh who prefer to hide away in their laboratories and create nightmares from the materials their servants supply. Engines of Pain, Grotesques, Wracks — all are the fruits of their subtle craft."

"Artists of the flesh who prefer to hide away in their laboratories and create nightmares from the materials their servants supply. Engines of Pain, Grotesques, Wracks — all are the fruits of their subtle craft."

"Artists of the flesh who prefer to hide away in their laboratories and create nightmares from the materials their servants supply. Engines of Pain, Grotesques, Wracks — all are the fruits of their subtle craft."

"Artists of the flesh who prefer to hide away in their laboratories and create nightmares from the materials their servants supply. Engines of Pain, Grotesques, Wracks — all are the fruits of their subtle craft."

languages.text: «Artistas de la carne que prefieren refugiarse en sus laboratorios y crear pesadillas a partir de los materiales que les proporcionan sus sirvientes. Los Motores del Dolor, los Grotescos, los Atormentados... todos son obras de su sublime creación».
languages.original_text: "Artists of the flesh who prefer to hide away in their laboratories and create nightmares from the materials their servants supply. Engines of Pain, Grotesques, Wracks — all are the fruits of their subtle craft."

traits.locale_text: «Artistas de la carne que prefieren refugiarse en sus laboratorios y crear pesadillas a partir de los materiales que les proporcionan sus sirvientes. Los Motores del Dolor, los Grotescos, los Atormentados... todos son obras de su sublime creación».

languages.text: “血伶人是肉体艺术的大师，他们喜欢躲在实验室里，用仆人带来的材料制造各种各样的恐怖之物。痛苦引擎、畸人、凌虐者——这些都是他们精湛技艺的结晶。”
languages.original_text: "Artists of the flesh who prefer to hide away in their laboratories and create nightmares from the materials their servants supply. Engines of Pain, Grotesques, Wracks — all are the fruits of their subtle craft."

traits.locale_text: “血伶人是肉体艺术的大师，他们喜欢躲在实验室里，用仆人带来的材料制造各种各样的恐怖之物。痛苦引擎、畸人、凌虐者——这些都是他们精湛技艺的结晶。”

languages.text: 「生身のアーティストたちは、研究室に隠れて使用人が持ってくる材料を使って悪夢を作り出す方を好む。エンジン・オブ・ペイン、グロテスク、ラック…どれも彼らの繊細な技の成果だ」
languages.original_text: "Artists of the flesh who prefer to hide away in their laboratories and create nightmares from the materials their servants supply. Engines of Pain, Grotesques, Wracks — all are the fruits of their subtle craft."

traits.locale_text: 「生身のアーティストたちは、研究室に隠れて使用人が持ってくる材料を使って悪夢を作り出す方を好む。エンジン・オブ・ペイン、グロテスク、ラック…どれも彼らの繊細な技の成果だ」

languages.text: « Ce sont des artistes de la chair qui préfèrent se terrer dans leurs laboratoires afin de concevoir des engins cauchemardesques à partir des matières premières fournies par leurs serviteurs. Machines de tourment, grotesques, gorgones... Tels sont les fruits de leur subtil savoir-faire. »
languages.original_text: "Artists of the flesh who prefer to hide away in their laboratories and create nightmares from the materials their servants supply. Engines of Pain, Grotesques, Wracks — all are the fruits of their subtle craft."

traits.locale_text: « Ce sont des artistes de la chair qui préfèrent se terrer dans leurs laboratoires afin de concevoir des engins cauchemardesques à partir des matières premières fournies par leurs serviteurs. Machines de tourment, grotesques, gorgones... Tels sont les fruits de leur subtil savoir-faire. »

languages.text: "Künstler des Fleischs, die sich lieber in ihren Laboratorien verstecken und Albträume aus den Materialien erschaffen, die ihre Diener ihnen bringen. Schmerzmaschinen, Grotesken, Folterer — allesamt das Ergebnis ihrer subtilen Kunst."
languages.original_text: "Artists of the flesh who prefer to hide away in their laboratories and create nightmares from the materials their servants supply. Engines of Pain, Grotesques, Wracks — all are the fruits of their subtle craft."

traits.locale_text: "Künstler des Fleischs, die sich lieber in ihren Laboratorien verstecken und Albträume aus den Materialien erschaffen, die ihre Diener ihnen bringen. Schmerzmaschinen, Grotesken, Folterer — allesamt das Ergebnis ihrer subtilen Kunst."

languages.original_text: "Artists of the flesh who prefer to hide away in their laboratories and create nightmares from the materials their servants supply. Engines of Pain, Grotesques, Wracks — all are the fruits of their subtle craft."

languages.text: "Laboratuvarlarına kapamış, hizmetkârlarından gelen kaynakları kâbuslara çeviren et üstatları. Acı Motorları, Groteskler, Haraplar... Hepsi de onların zanaatı."
languages.original_text: "Artists of the flesh who prefer to hide away in their laboratories and create nightmares from the materials their servants supply. Engines of Pain, Grotesques, Wracks — all are the fruits of their subtle craft."

traits.locale_text: "Laboratuvarlarına kapamış, hizmetkârlarından gelen kaynakları kâbuslara çeviren et üstatları. Acı Motorları, Groteskler, Haraplar... Hepsi de onların zanaatı."
